channel.title: Bbc on DavidCraddock.net
channel.description: Recent content in Bbc on DavidCraddock.net

item.title: 2013 Career Retrospective
item.description: 2015 Update: The “Device Hive” project has now been changed to be called ‘Hive CI’ and it is being maintained by a team of developers at the BBC, which I am no longer a part of. It is in the process of being opensourced, see: http://bbc.github.io/hive-ci/ This year has been quite a busy and eventful one for me. Connected Red Button At the start of the year, I was working on the Connected Red Button team within the BBC.
